NAME: C1.1
Description: Is there board-level oversight of climate-related issues within your organization?

NAME: C1.1a
Description: Identify the position(s) (do not include any names) of the individual(s) on the board with responsibility for climate-related issues.

NAME: C1.1b
Description: Provide further details on the board’s oversight of climate-related issues.

NAME: C1.1c
Description: Why is there no board-level oversight of climate-related issues and what are your plans to change this in the future?

NAME: C1.1d
Description: Does your organization have at least one board member with competence on climate-related issues?

NAME: C1.2
Description: Provide the highest management-level position(s) or committee(s) with responsibility for climate-related issues.

NAME: C1.3
Description: Do you provide incentives for the management of climate-related issues, including the attainment of targets?

NAME: C1.3a
Description: Provide further details on the incentives provided for the management of climate-related issues (do not include the names of individuals).

NAME: C-FS1.4
Description: Does your organization offer its employees an employment-based retirement scheme that incorporates ESG criteria, including climate change?

NAME: C2.1
Description: Does your organization have a process for identifying, assessing, and responding to climate-related risks and opportunities?

NAME: C2.1a
Description: How does your organization define short-, medium- and long-term time horizons?

NAME: C2.1b
Description: How does your organization define substantive financial or strategic impact on your business?

NAME: C2.2
Description: Describe your process(es) for identifying, assessing and responding to climate-related risks and opportunities.

NAME: C2.2a
Description: Which risk types are considered in your organization's climate-related risk assessments?

NAME: C-FS2.2b
Description: Do you assess your portfolio's exposure to climate-related risks and opportunities?

NAME: C-FS2.2c
Description: Describe how you assess your portfolio's exposure to climate-related risks and opportunities.

NAME: C-FS2.2d
Description: Does your organization consider climate-related information about your clients/investees as part of your due diligence and/or risk assessment process?

NAME: C-FS2.2e
Description: Indicate the climate-related information your organization considers about clients/investees as part of your due diligence and/or risk assessment process, and how this influences decision-making.

NAME: C2.2g
Description: Why does your organization not have a process in place for identifying, assessing, and responding to climate-related risks and opportunities, and do you plan to introduce such a process in the future?

NAME: C2.3
Description: Have you identified any inherent climate-related risks with the potential to have a substantive financial or strategic impact on your business?

NAME: C2.3a
Description: Provide details of risks identified with the potential to have a substantive financial or strategic impact on your business.

NAME: C2.3b
Description: Why do you not consider your organization to be exposed to climate-related risks with the potential to have a substantive financial or strategic impact on your business?

NAME: C2.4
Description: Have you identified any climate-related opportunities with the potential to have a substantive financial or strategic impact on your business? Change from last year

NAME: C2.4a
Description: Provide details of opportunities identified with the potential to have a substantive financial or strategic impact on your business.

NAME: C2.4b
Description: Why do you not consider your organization to have climate-related opportunities?

NAME: C3.1
Description: Does your organization’s strategy include a transition plan that aligns with a 1.5°C world?

NAME: C3.2
Description: Does your organization use climate-related scenario analysis to inform its strategy?

NAME: C3.2a
Description: Provide details of your organization’s use of climate-related scenario analysis

NAME: C3.2b
Description: Provide details of the focal questions your organization seeks to address by using climate-related scenario analysis, and summarize the results with respect to these questions.

NAME: C3.3
Description: Describe where and how climate-related risks and opportunities have influenced your strategy.

NAME: C3.4
Description: Describe where and how climate-related risks and opportunities have influenced your financial planning.

NAME: C3.5
Description: In your organization’s financial accounting, do you identify spending/revenue that is aligned with your organization’s transition to a 1.5°C world?

NAME: C3.5a
Description: Quantify the percentage share of your spending/revenue that is aligned with your organization’s transition to a 1.5°C world.

NAME: C-FS3.6
Description: Does the policy framework for your portfolio activities include climate-related requirements for clients/investees, and/or exclusion policies?

NAME: C-FS3.6a
Description: Provide details of the policies which include climate-related requirements that clients/investees need to meet.

NAME: C-FS3.6b
Description: Provide details of your exclusion policies related to industries and/or activities exposed or contributing to climate-related risks.

NAME: C-FS3.6c
Description: Why does the policy framework for your portfolio activities not include climate-related requirements for clients/investees, and/or exclusion policies?

NAME: C-FS3.7
Description: Does your organization include climate-related requirements in your selection process and engagement with external asset managers?

NAME: C-FS3.7a
Description: Provide details of the climate-related requirements included in your selection process and engagement with external asset managers.

NAME: C-FS3.8
Description: Does your organization include covenants in financing agreements to reflect and enforce your climate-related policies?

NAME: C-FS3.8a
Description: Provide details of the covenants included in your organization’s financing agreements to reflect and enforce your climate-related policies

NAME: C4.1
Description: Did you have an emissions target that was active in the reporting year?

NAME: C4.1a
Description: Provide details of your absolute emissions target(s) and progress made against those targets.

NAME: C4.1b
Description: Provide details of your emissions intensity target(s) and progress made against those target(s).

NAME: C4.1c
Description: Explain why you did not have an emissions target, and forecast how your emissions will change over the next five years.

NAME: C-FS4.1d
Description: Provide details of the climate-related targets for your portfolio.

NAME: C4.2
Description: Did you have any other climate-related targets that were active in the reporting year?

NAME: C4.2a
Description: Provide details of your target(s) to increase low-carbon energy consumption or production.
Connected to other Frameworks: TCFD;SDG; 2018 RobecoSAM Corporate Sustainability Assessment (DJSI); RE100

NAME: C4.2b
Description: Provide details of any other climate-related targets, including methane reduction targets.

NAME: C4.2c
Description: TCFD;SDG; 2018 RobecoSAM Corporate Sustainability Assessment (DJSI)

NAME: C4.3
Description: Did you have emissions reduction initiatives that were active within the reporting year? Note that this can include those in the planning and/or implementation phases.

NAME: C4.3a
Description: Identify the total number of initiatives at each stage of development, and for those in the implementation stages, the estimated CO2e savings.

NAME: C4.3b
Description: Provide details on the initiatives implemented in the reporting year in the table below.

NAME: C4.3c
Description: What methiods do you use to drive investment in emissions reduction activities?

NAME: C4.3d
Description: Why did you not have any emissions reduction initiatives active during the reporting year?

NAME: C-FS4.5
Description: Do any of your existing products and services enable clients to mitigate and/or adapt to the effects of climate change?

NAME: C-FS4.5a
Description: Provide details of your existing products and services that enable clients to mitigate and/or adapt to climate change, including any taxonomy used to classify the products(s).

NAME: C5.1a
Description: Has your organization undergone any structural changes in the reporting year, or are any previous structural changes being accounted for in this disclosure of emissions data?

NAME: C5.1b
Description: Has your emissions accounting methodology, boundary, and/or reporting year definition changed in the reporting year?

NAME: C5.1c
Description: Have your organization’s base year emissions been recalculated as result of the changes or errors reported in C5.1a and C5.1b?

NAME: C5.2
Description: Provide your base year and base year emissions.

NAME: C5.3
Description: Select the name of the standard, protocol, or methodology you have used to collect activity data and calculate emissions.

NAME: C6.1
Description: What were your organization’s gross global Scope 1 emissions in metric tons CO2e?

NAME: C6.2
Description: Describe your organization's approach to reporting Scope 2 emissions.

NAME: C6.3
Description: What were your organization's gross global Scope 2 emissions in metric tons CO2e?

NAME: C6.4
Description: Are there any sources (e.g. facilities, specific GHGs, activities, geographies, etc.) of Scope 1 and Scope 2 emissions that are within your selected reporting boundary which are not included in your disclosure?

NAME: C6.4a
Description: Provide details of the sources of Scope 1 and Scope 2 emissions that are within your selected reporting boundary which are not included in your disclosure.

NAME: C6.5
Description: Account for your organization’s gross global Scope 3 emissions, disclosing and explaining any exclusions.

NAME: C6.5a
Description: Disclose or restate your Scope 3 emissions data for previous years

NAME: C6.10
Description: Describe your gross global combined Scope 1 and 2 emissions for the reporting year in metric tons CO2e per unit currency total revenue and provide any additional intensity metrics that are appropriate to your business operations.

NAME: C7.4
Description: applies to organizations with activities in the following sectors: Agricultural commodities Food, beverage & tobacco Paper & forestry Coal Electric utilities Oil and gas Cement Chemical Metals and mining Steel Transport OEMs Transport services

Description: Question C-CE7.7/C-CH7.7/C-CO7.7/C-MM7.7/C-OG7.7/C-ST7.7/C-TO7.7/C-TS7.7 only applies to organizations with activities in the following sectors: Cement Chemicals Coal Metals & mining Oil & gas Steel Transport OEMS Transport services

NAME: C7.8
Description: Question C7.8 only applies to organizations with activities in the following sectors: Chemicals Transport manufacturers

NAME: C7.9
Description: How do your gross global emissions (Scope 1 and 2 combined) for the reporting year compare to those of the previous reporting year?

Description: Are your emissions performance calculations in C7.9 and C7.9a based on a location-based Scope 2 emissions figure or a market-based Scope 2 emissions figure?

Description: What percentage of your total operational spend in the reporting year was on energy?

Description: Select which energy-related activities your organization has undertaken.

Description: Report your organization’s energy consumption totals (excluding feedstocks) in MWh.

NAME: C8.2m

NAME: C9.1
Description: Provide any additional climate-related metrics relevant to your business.

NAME: C11.3a
